messages.message:
Hi Brian,

I am in the process of relaunching my business BtoBLeads.com - focus on adding human touch for companies that are struggling with the management of marketing automation. So we create and manage sales pipeline strategies for clients. 

Larry Carlson
No, however it would be worth exploring some type of partnership with them. Are you involved with application development projects? I have an idea to bounce off of you if so...

I have taken four clients' sales process and refined them by creating a tool for each one that basically takes their lead qualification process and develops a report based on prospects answers and delivers a recommendation to the user. I want to offer this as a service when I re-launch my business BtoBLeads.com. This concept also is a great strategy for getting leads and using a generic website and promote in social media. I could explain it better in a conversation...
Let's talk soon. My first impression, this comes off similar to Salesforce and pipedrive. My number is 4804660856, please feel free to leave a voicemail and I'll call back.
